translation.en: ♪ I say you can't bеcause I lost it When I knew you were alive ♪ ♪ I'll go anywhere you wanna go ♪

translation.ja: “やっぱり休み時間に 会おう”

translation.en: [principal over PA] Happy New Year, Truham boys.
translation.ja: 明けましておめでとう

translation.en: Uh, don't forget there'll now be students from all school years
translation.ja: 様々な学年からなる 新しいクラスが始まります

translation.en: in your new form groups. I hope you enjoy getting to know
translation.ja: 様々な学年からなる 新しいクラスが始まります “新教室 Ｂ25！” たくさんの出会いが ありますように

translation.en: some fresh faces in registration each day.
translation.ja: たくさんの出会いが ありますように

translation.en: Oh! If it isn't Charlie Spring. Happy New Year.
translation.ja: チャーリー 明けましておめでとう
ハムレットグループに？

translation.en: Where did I put you on the seating plan?
Ah, yes, you're over there. Next to Nicholas Nelson.
translation.ja: ニコラス･ネルソンの隣だ

translation.en: He's in Year 11, so only one year older than you.
translation.ja: 君より１つ上の学年で ラグビー部の部員だ

translation.en: One of the rugby boys too, I think. I'm sure you'll get along swimmingly.
translation.ja: 君より１つ上の学年で ラグビー部の部員だ きっと仲良くなれる

translation.en: Or you can just sit in silence for the rest of the year.
translation.ja: 無理に話さなくてもいいが

translation.en: It really doesn't affect me in any way whatsoever.
translation.ja: 私には関係のないことだ
さっきはごめん いいんだ

translation.en: I missed your face so much.
Really? Did you have a good Christmas?
Yeah, it was all right. You?
Yeah. Yeah, it was good. Um…
My whole family was around on Christmas day and then…
translation.ja: 家族みんなが集まって…

translation.en: -Still don't tell anyone about this. -Oh. Um…

translation.ja: あっち？ ああ 数学だ

translation.en: Are you literally doing your homework while walking to your lesson?
translation.ja: 歩きながら宿題してるの？

translation.en: That makes me sound way cooler than I actually am.
Do you want me to do that for you?
-No, I'm good. -I can tell you the answer.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ 答えを教える

translation.en: If you're stuck I can just… Let me just…
[chuckles] Why are you talking to me? I don't know who you are.
translation.ja: 知り合いでもないのに？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He's in my year.
-Didn't you do that yesterday? -Yes, Isaac. Yes, I did.
translation.ja: 昨日もだろ そうだ　アイザック
エルは転校した 分かってる

translation.en: -She's not been here all week. -I know. I keep forgetting.
translation.ja: もう いない つい忘れちゃうんだよ

translation.en: Tao, you're allowed to miss her.
translation.ja: タオ 寂しくて当然だ

translation.en: [Tao] Okay, fine. It's better that she's at an all-girls school.
translation.ja: そりゃあ エルには 女子校の方がいいさ

translation.en: Mr. Reed was still refusing to call her Elle.
translation.ja: 先生からも不当に扱われない

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Reed's a massive transphobe.
translation.ja: リード先生は差別的だ

translation.en: There used to be four of us, now there's only three.
Like, four is a group. Three is just a… trio.
translation.ja: 今では 僕たち３人しか いないなんて

translation.en: The guy you sit next to in form?
-Who? -[Tao] He looks like a golden retriever.
translation.ja: 誰だっけ？ きれいな犬みたい

translation.en: [Charlie] He doesn't look like a golden retriever.
I can't believe you've been sat next to rugby king Nick Nelson.
translation.ja: ラグビー王の隣の席とはな

translation.en: What are you going to talk about?
Charlie, you don't have a tissue, do you?
translation.ja: ティッシュ持ってない？

translation.en: -[Nick] It's not coming off. -You're gonna be blue forever.
translation.ja: もう一生 落ちないかも

translation.en: Looks like I'm wearing blue gloves!
You can make it the new school fashion.
Or I'll pretend it's a tattoo.

translation.ja: 何で？ あいつらを見ろよ

translation.en: We are a group. No, a trio of borderline outcasts.
translation.ja: 僕たちは落ちこぼれ３人組

translation.en: He is the star player on the rugby team,
translation.ja: 彼はラグビー部のスター

translation.en: and he's friends with a bunch of loud, gross Year 11s
translation.ja: それに威張った上級生と 友達だ

translation.en: who are like the guys who bullied you last year.
translation.ja: それに威張った上級生と 友達だ 去年 いじめられたろ

translation.en: I bet he's a whole different person when he's with his bro dude friends.
translation.ja: 乱暴な仲間といる時は 全くの別人になるさ

translation.en: [woman] Lunch ends in five minutes, girls.
translation.ja: ランチはあと５分よ ランチはあと５分よ ヒッグス女子校 ヒッグス女子校

translation.en: We don't make exceptions, even for new students.
translation.ja: 転校生でも例外はなし

translation.en: You can have this back from reception at the end of the day.
[Ben] You know I'm sorry about ignoring you yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日は無視してごめん

translation.en: [teacher] It's quite a while since you've hidden in here at lunch.
translation.ja: どうして ここに隠れてる？
ランチを食べてる そうか

translation.en: No bullies I need to sort out again?
translation.ja: もう いじめもなし？

translation.en: Actually, there is kind of someone.
translation.ja: 本当は ある人のことで 悩んでる
実は彼氏ができたんだ
よかった　おめでとう
つまり？ 分からないんだ

translation.en: I don't think he even thinks we're boyfriends anyway.
translation.ja: 彼も僕を恋人と思ってるのか

translation.en: He doesn't even like people seeing us talk to each other in the corridors.
translation.ja: 僕と話してるのを 見られたくないから

translation.en: He pretends like he doesn't know who I am.
[sighs] But then when it's just us two he's fine.
Well, have you talked to him about how that makes you feel?
translation.ja: 自分がどう感じてるか 彼に伝えた？

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to him then?
What do you want me to say? Break up with him?
translation.ja: 別れろと言ってほしい？

translation.en: -[Charlie] I don't know. -Well, do you want to break up with him?
translation.ja: 分からない 別れたいんだな

translation.en: I can't solve your problems for you, Charlie.
What about your friends, have you talked to them about it?
It's better to be honest about your feelings in the long run.
I know. It took you three months to tell me you were being bullied.
translation.ja: いじめのことも 黙ってたもんな

translation.en: -I'd never lie to you, don't worry. -Okay.
-We will. If you're nice. -Never mind then.
I broke up with my boyfriend.
Hypothetically, what sort of boy do you want to go out with?
translation.ja: どんな人と付き合いたいの？

translation.en: One who doesn't mind people seeing us talk to each other would be nice.
translation.ja: 人前で僕と話をしてくれる人

translation.en: Someone who's also a nerd, or do you want an "opposites attract" thing?
translation.ja: オタク仲間か真逆のタイプか

translation.en: I don't think I can afford to be that specific, to be honest.
translation.ja: えり好みはできないよ

translation.en: Just someone I can have a laugh with. And… and he's nice.
translation.ja: 一緒に笑い合えて 感じのいい人がいい

translation.en: I'd probably just settle for someone tall.
translation.ja: それから 背が高い人

translation.en: We've been doing this all term and no one's beaten Charlie's time yet.
translation.ja: チャーリーを追い抜いて

translation.en: Charlie's leaving you all in the dust!
translation.ja: また チャーリーが１番よ

translation.en: So, um, I had something I wanted to ask you.
translation.ja: 君に頼みたいことがあるんだ

translation.en: Charlie… I wanted to tell you that I'm gay too.
translation.ja: チャーリー 実は僕もゲイだ

translation.en: And I'm in love with you.
Do you want to go out with me?
I want to be with you forever.
Do you want to join the rugby team?
We have enough players for the team but we're not allowed to actually play against other teams without a reserve.
translation.ja: 試合に出るために リザーブが必要なんだ

translation.en: And I saw you run in PE and you're, like, really fast.
translation.ja: 君は走るのがすごく速いから

translation.en: So… I thought you might be interested.
translation.ja: 興味ないかなと思って

translation.en: I don't really know how to play.
That's fine. I can teach you.
Aren't I a bit small and weak to be a rugby player?
translation.ja: 僕は小さいし貧弱すぎない？

translation.en: We're just a school team, you know. It's not that serious.
translation.ja: プロになるわけじゃない

translation.en: So you're saying I am small and weak?
So, do you want to join?
It's literally just another silly crush.
translation.ja: まったくホレっぽいな

translation.en: It's not a crush. I don't just fall for any guy who's nice to me.
translation.ja: 優しくされたくらいで ホレない

translation.en: And you're sure you want to spend a whole hour
translation.ja: 本当にラグビー部に 入りたいのか？
本当にラグビー部に 入りたいのか？ そうだ

translation.en: -[boy 2] Isn't he in Year 8? -[boy 3] No. Year 10.
[boy 1] Can he even play? I'm sure he's a nice guy but we actually want to be dece.
translation.ja: ヤツのせいで負けるのは ゴメンだ

translation.en: [boy 4] Does he even like sports? Everyone knows he's gay.
translation.ja: ゲイなのに スポーツに興味が？

translation.en: I know I was joking about being weak, but I'm definitely too weak for this.
translation.ja: 冗談抜きで 僕には無理だと思う

translation.en: Just try. Tackle me, I won't dodge.
Come on, I bet you can do it.
Now, let's try again while I'm actually moving.
translation.ja: 実際の動きをやってみよう

translation.en: [rugby boys] One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
Yeah, you got it. One more time, come on.

translation.ja: 受け取って チャーリー

translation.en: One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
[boy] Come on, mate. We've got practice.

translation.ja: トライする 分かった

translation.en: And you try and run up to me.
You're wearing a coat? It's not even cold.
translation.ja: コートなんて暑苦しい

translation.en: God, what's your problem? I'm trying to be nice.
I said I don't want to meet up anymore.

translation.ja: そんなの信じない 何で？

translation.en: You're clearly just scared of getting caught.
translation.ja: バレるのが怖いだけだろ

translation.en: Why would I be scared of getting caught?
Everyone in school already knows I'm gay.
translation.ja: 僕はゲイだと知られてる

translation.en: You're the one who's scared of getting caught.
You can't even look at me when other people are around.
translation.ja: 人前では目も合わせない

translation.en: Not to mention the fact that you have a girlfriend.
Yeah. I've seen you with her at the school gate.
Don't be angry at me for not wanting to come out yet.
translation.ja: ゲイだと知られたくない

translation.en: If you're figuring stuff out, fine. Take your time. I would have been there for you.
translation.ja: 君がカミングアウトするまで 待つつもりだった

translation.en: Don't you think I, of all people, would understand you're figuring out your sexuality?
translation.ja: 苦しんでる君を僕が怒ると？

translation.en: Then why are you angry at me?
I'm angry because you never even slightly cared about my feelings.
translation.ja: 僕の気持ちを考えないからだ

translation.en: We only ever meet up when you want to. Where you want to. When you feel like kissing a boy.
translation.ja: 君が男とキスしたい時に 呼び出すだけ

translation.en: You don't care about me at all.
It's not like anyone else is going to want to go out with you, is it?
translation.ja: 他の男なら相手にすらしない

translation.en: -I know you like me. -[Charlie] Stop it!
translation.ja: 俺が好きだろ やめてくれ

translation.en: Charlie, I like you but I'm figuring stuff out.
What more do you want from me?
Did you hear all of that?
You seemed kind of like something was up while we were getting changed, so I…
translation.ja: 帰り際に元気がないように 見えたから

translation.en: I wanted to check everything was okay.
You have nothing to be sorry about.
-I kind of want to say it. -[chuckles] Don't.
We'll get locked in if we stay here much longer.

translation.ja: “チャーリー： ありがとう”
